body_html: The error says that the SnapshotOp kernel is not available for GPU. It's a relatively new kernel. You said you compiled from source, so I believe this kernel should have compiled for GPU. @rmlarsen do you see anything wrong with the application of this kernel?
body_text: The error says that the SnapshotOp kernel is not available for GPU.  It's a relatively new kernel.  You said you compiled from source, so I believe this kernel should have compiled for GPU.  @rmlarsen do you see anything wrong with the application of this kernel?
body: The error says that the SnapshotOp kernel is not available for GPU.  It's a relatively new kernel.  You said you compiled from source, so I believe this kernel should have compiled for GPU.  @rmlarsen do you see anything wrong with the application of this kernel?
